text:
@Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @FLOTUS A big reason to wear your mask 🔽
Gavin Roberts,  10, at the funeral of his dad, Charles “Rob” Roberts, a New Jersey police officer who died after contacting COVID-19 while on duty protecting others.
The dad’s sacrifice was heroic.
 https://t.co/ZY34AE4ev7
